秘密.definition: secret; private; confidential; clandestine; a secret (CL:個|个[ge4])

秘笈.definition: secret book or collection of books

秘聞.definition: matters (concerning a prominent family etc) intended to be kept private

秘製.definition: to prepare (food etc) using a secret recipe

秘訣.definition: secret know-how; key (to longevity); secret (of happiness); recipe (for success)

秘辛.definition: behind-the-scenes story; details known only to insiders

秘魯苦蘵.definition: Peruvian ground-cherry; cape gooseberry; Physalis peruviana
